mapper.select: select si.si_no, si.si_subtitle, qs.qs_no, qs.qs_type, qs.qs_detail, qs.qs_order, so.so_no, so.so_detail, so.so_order, COUNT(sa.sa_no) as sa_count from survey_info_tb si LEFT OUTER JOIN question_tb qs ON si.si_no = qs.qs_si_no LEFT OUTER JOIN select_option_tb so ON qs.qs_no = so.so_qs_no LEFT OUTER JOIN select_answer_tb sa ON so.so_no = sa.sa_so_no where si.si_ui_no = #{ui_no} group by si.si_no, si.si_subtitle, qs.qs_no, qs.qs_type, qs.qs_detail, qs.qs_order, so.so_no, so.so_detail, so.so_order;
